title: No funciona la sincronización
content:
Hola, ya esto me tiene harto, 2 veces intento sincronizar mi cuenta para poder descargar las contraseñas y los marcadores y no sincroniza nada, dice sincronizando pero nunca descarga nada, ya 2 veces, he tenido que instalar w10 de cero, instalo le Mozilla Firefox, inicio sesión y no descarga nada, pierdo todas mis contraseñas y tengo que restablecerlas siempre una por una conforme necesito entrar a las cuentas, necesito una solución, no voy a estar restableciendo contraseñas de todas mis cuentas otra vez...

Entonces para que me pide sincronizar si al final pierdo toda mi información?
creator: miguelsot959

title: Mozilla firefox parou de autenticar para entrar no mercado livre
content:
Bom dia! Sempre acessei o Mercado Livre com firefox! Faz mais de dez anos que faço isso. Porém, de duas ou 3 semanas para cá, o mozilla Fierefox simplesmente não dá sequência no processo de autenticação. Entro com login, sigo para inserir a senha e, ao clicar em continuar nada acontece. Antes, após inserir a senha a página gerava um QR code que era lido pelo Mercado Pago pelo celular. Agora esta sequência não ocorre mais. O site para antes de gerar o QR code. A solução foi mudar para o google Chrome.

Qual pode ser o problema?
creator: lgcotta

title: Skype for Business 2016 desktop app not launching from Firefox
content:
Skype for Business 2016 desktop app is not loaded from Mozilla Firefox (102.15.1 ESR) Using handlers.json : "lync15":{"action":2,"handlers":[{"name":"lync.exe","path":"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\Office16\\lync.exe"}]}.

lync15://foo or any generated skype meeting just does not open Skype for Business 2016 desktop app.

It is working with MS Edge, but not with Firefox. It was working before on Windows Server 2012 R2, but now with Windows Server not.

content: Recently, I switched to Fedora 39. At first, Firefox was working fine, but after I logged into my Firefox account, the fonts of some languages stopped rendering, and this started happening with almost every site that was using system fonts.
creator: theskpaul

title: Outlook email does not allow embedded links to open if Firefox is the default browser
content:
Embedded links in Outlook email on Windows 10 will not open automatically when the new email is first opened to be read if Firefox has been selected as the default Browser. This is a new issue !

The message is" if there are problems with how this message is displayed, click HERE to view it in a web browser " and then the Browser used is only Edge!

Restoring disliked Edge to be the default browser corrects the issue but Edge is a known tracking device.

title: ricerca
content: Buongiorno, da qualche settimana Firefox non mi fa la ricerca appena scrivo qualcosa nella barra degli indirizzi. O meglio, mi fa la ricerca le prime due/tre volte, poi scrivendo qualcosa da ricercare non cerca nè compare nulla. Ho provato diverse soluzioni ma nulla. Qualcuno può aiutarmi?
creator: cosimo.capestrano

title: Tab Grouping app replacement or work-around
content:
I am trying to migrate from a very old version of Firefox (v. 55) to the current one, but there is an app that is more helpful to me that all the other features combined. That is the "Tab Grouping" app that will not run in any version of FF higher than v. 55.

In my work, which often includes a tremendous amount of research, I need to be able to quickly go from one group of tabs to another. If I had to open all these sites manually, that would take the better part of the day and frankly I don't have near the mental capacity to remember the tremendous number of tabs. I have had a couple replies (Thanks!) to this question sometime back, but unfortunately none were even close in performance.

So, can anyone direct me to an app that will allow very quick movement from different sets of windows/tab groups (please see screen shots below)? Is there anyway that I can get this app to work in Legacy mode? I have several other old apps that work perfectly well in this mode.
creator: wolfgang3838

title: Netflix Still Not Playing With Firefox For PC
content: I've read a few old threads and checked both the DRM setting and the "-Vine" as they recommended. Still no luck getting it to work. I'm posting yet another thread about this here because I'm getting a bit frustrated, frankly. Firefox is my favorite browser by far, I just wonder if anyone has found another way to fix this.

title: How do I fix an APK not installed?
content:
The Android app not installed error can be combated after resetting app permissions. Go to Settings > Apps > Reset App Preferences/Reset Application Permissions. After this, third-party software can be installed on your device.

Latest Free Apk

title: Mozilla Otomatik Video Oynatma Engelleme
content:
Merhaba arkadaşlar herkese kolay gelsin.

Ekran kartından dolayı olduğunu düşündüğüm videolarda özellikle monitörde sağ üstte RGB yazısı ve mavi ekran hatası olduğunu düşünüyorum. Ekran kartını değiştirmek veya yeni almak derdinde değilim. Bizler izlemek istediğimiz videoları oynatıyoruz zaten..

Olay şöyle; Direk videolar oynatmaya başlamasın playladığımız zaman oynatsın. Bu videoları otomatik oynatmasın nereden ne yapabilirim... Seçenekler veya bir eklenti ile videoları oynatmama gibi bir çözüm var mı?

Yardımcı olacak arkadaşlara şimdiden çok teşekkür ederim.

title: alert box not closing when the page is reloaded
content:
Hi All, 

Deploying few  features for a system using firefox browser.

In once scenario, on a user action , showing an alert box and redirecting page to new URL. On this , new page is loaded and after loading the page, the alert box disappeared This is working in my last system configuration, which is MozillaFirefox-78.9.0-112.54.1.x86_64

I am upgrading the system now I am using MozillaFirefox-115.3.1-150200.152.111.1.x86_64 In this configuration, the previous alert box is not removed when page is reloaded Any configuration/setting has to be done in firebox browser to automatically close the alert box?

title: Aplicativo SHODO do TRT1
content:
Esta informação é dada quando tento acessar a Justiça do Trabalho, com o validador SHODO: Erro: Não houve comunicação com o aplicativo Shodō. Verifique os seguintes pontos:

-Certifique-se de que o aplicativo Shodō (versão 1.2.0 ou superior) esteja instalado em sua máquina; -Certifique-se de que o aplicativo esteja em execução, observando se seu ícone aparece ao lado do relógio do Windows (bandeja do Windows); -Em seu navegador, acesse o endereço https://127.0.0.1:9000 e aceite a restrição de certificado indicada. Esse passo é necessário para registrar o certificado do Shodō no navegador de forma a permitir que o PJe se comunique com esse aplicativo.
creator: mauroesteves1
